19/* Id */
20
21#ifndef ISC_XML_H
22#define ISC_XML_H 1
23
24/*
25 * This file is here mostly to make it easy to add additional libxml header
26 * files as needed across all the users of this file. Rather than place
27 * these libxml includes in each file, one include makes it easy to handle
28 * the ifdef as well as adding the ability to add additional functions
29 * which may be useful.
30 */
31
32#ifdef HAVE_LIBXML2
33#include <libxml/encoding.h>
34#include <libxml/xmlwriter.h>
35#endif
36
37#define ISC_XMLCHAR (const xmlChar *)
38
39#define ISC_XML_RENDERCONFIG 0x00000001 /* render config data */
40#define ISC_XML_RENDERSTATS 0x00000002 /* render stats */
41#define ISC_XML_RENDERALL 0x000000ff /* render everything */
42
43#endif /* ISC_XML_H */
44
